page.title: 16A Local Housewife
page.content: A local mum came to school to talk to us, we found out a few things about her.Her name is Dorothy Wood and she lives at 9,Maple Drive in Killamarsh. She has one child called Helen who is nine years old..Mrs. Wood is 37 and has a husband called John,she also has a Yorkshire terrier.Mrs. Wood's hobbies include painting, sewing, cooking,gardening,reading and decorating.She goes to church on Sunday.Her favourite programmes on television are comedies.She likes Indian food most especially chicken bhuna and likes drinking tea.Her daughter goes to St. Giles school and her husband is an engineer.Mrs. Wood has lived near Killamarsh at Beighton and in Broomhill,Sheffield.For her holidays she is going to Bridlington. She also enjoys helping in school with art and craft activities.
